FuncDef: The display snmp-agent vacmgroup command displays all the configured View-based Access Control Model (VACM) groups.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view the information about the group to which a User-based Security Model (USM) user is added, run the display snmp-agent vacmgroup command.
Prerequisites
An SNMP agent group has been configured using the snmp-agent group v3 command.
An SNMP community has been configured using the snmp-agent community command.
A USM user has been configured using the snmp-agent usm-user v3 command.
